scripts.deploy:cosmetics:local: source ../../../../common/.env.local && bun --env-file=../../../../common/.env.local -e "import {deployCollectible} from './deploy.js'; const dataFile = 'data/cosmetics/eternum-cosmetics.json'; console.log('ðŸ“ Using data file:', dataFile); deployCollectible(dataFile).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1)})"
